title: How to Make Brownie Nut Cranberry Coffee Cake With Brownie Mix

steps.headline: Mix eggs, oil, water, milk, and (optional) instant coffee together in a large bowl until coffee has melted.
Mix medium bowl stir together brownie mix, baking powder, wheat bran, nuts and cranberries together.
Grease pan at this point ensuring all sides and bottom are well oiled.
Stir dry ingredients into wet ingredients and STIR thoroughly for 2 minutes, stirring constantly until no lumps remain.
Bake in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes.
Check with toothpick at 25 min mark.

text: Mix eggs, oil, water, milk, and (optional) instant coffee together in a large bowl until coffee has melted. (hand mixer works well). Mix medium bowl stir together brownie mix, baking powder, wheat bran, nuts and cranberries together.  Grease pan at this point ensuring all sides and bottom are well oiled.  Preheat oven to 350ºF or 180ºC.  Stir dry ingredients into wet ingredients and STIR thoroughly for 2 minutes, stirring constantly until no lumps remain.  Pour this mixture into pan(s).  Bake in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes.  Check with toothpick at 25 min mark.  Finished.
